channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple commercial fly tipping, 15th February
item.description:
Again was debris had multiple commercial fly tipping incidents. Significant surveillance is needed as this is a persistent issue.

item.title: Cars parked on double yellow lines, 15th February
item.description:
The access road which runs from Brook Lane around Chiswell Square and back into Brook Lane is marked with double yellow lines. Recently cars have begun parking there and today, 15.2.26 an ambulance was unable to use because of this. It had to try both entrances as it could not get round because of vehicles blocking the way.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chiswell Square, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot holes plural in my disabled bay., 15th February
item.description:
Very dangerous for me as a wheelchair user to face large deep pot holes outside my house in my disabled bay. I have honey into them more than once in my wheelchair and almost tipped out.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lannoy Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking bay markings very faint., 15th February
item.description:
